reviews.review: This game is great but I expected more from Valve... It is too short for a Half Life game and it has a weird final... Now I want Half Life 3 really fast because I want to play more.
3'ü bekliyoruz

HL2 Ep. 2 continua la storia del più celebre FPS del mondo. Vediamo i ribelli in un mondo ormai post apocalittico, combattere con le ultime forze Combine rimaste. Una campagna estremamente dinamica e molto più avvincente rispetto a HL2 Ep. 1. Le ambientazioni sono molto particolari: usciremo infatti da City 17, per immergerci nella natura grazie a White Forest. Per quanto riguarda il gameplay non ci sono cambiamenti. A distanza di 10 anni, questo gioco riesce ancora a sorprendermi sia per la sua grafica, per i tempi veramente eccelsi, che per la fisica (che molti giochi di oggi si sognano).
ждём третьего эпизода)))

Se sigue la historia tras el final de la primera parte y se siguen mejorando los gráficos del motor Source, añadiendo enemigos...

Nota: 9,5/10

HL2:EP1 was an amazing game, but it wasn't so innovative as HL2. HL2:EP2 take all the good things from the precursors games and adds new enemies, new environments, new characters, all packed with a brilliant history. This is my favorite HL game and the best in my opinion.

Positives:
+ More history development;
+ The characters are well developed.
+ All the good things from HL2 and HL2:EP1
+ A lot of innovations: new weapons, new game mechanics, new environments, new enemies and new characters.

Negatives:
- It's a little too short, like all the episodes.
- Don't have a sequel :( 

10/10 - You must play this! 

And welcome to the Half Life 3 waiting community!

Must avoid mentioning episode 3 here...

Half life 2 was always a great game. This game puts more emphasis on difficult battles in the first half, and vehicle exploration in the second half. The most memorable part has to be the finale, though I wont spoil anything. 
This game also continues Episode One's feature of teaming up with Alyx throughout most of the game, who makes a great companion and is a proficient fighter. 
Except this, the game is exactly like the previous two games. If you liked those games, this is more than a must-buy. If you didn't, buy it anyway. It is a great game from beginning to end (even if the plot leaves on an unresolved cliffhanger)

Overall, a brilliant game for both half life fans and the first person shooter community. Definitely recommended.
Also, keep a tally of how many real garden gnomes you smashed when going for the Little Rocket Man achievement. I hate that Gnome...

Episode Two is even more amazing.  What is disappointing is why Episode Three has never been released.  Valve, we are your gamers.  We are fans of the series.  We were so hyped after we played this years back, and over time, that hype has slowly faded and much confusion replaced it.  I mean, what exactly happened?  Did developers leave the project?  Voice actors go on strike?  Did a very important voice actor pass away or go missing?

I don't get why no clear answers are given.  We would understand if something went wrong that would cause major delays or a halt on the project.  We just want answers.  It's been 8 years.  Don't we gamers deserve a response?

In any case, Half-Life, Half-Life 2, and all the episodes are fantastic.

[h1]Strider Battle: Really??[/h1]

HL2 Ep2 is a great game, it is quite a bit longer than Ep1, and the graphics are more detailed and more demanding than HL2 and Ep1 (and the requirements for the graphics card, too, but no problem for today's hardware, even low-end).

The game features pre-computed highly detailed physics destructions on several special occasions that I really liked for eyecandy, even from today's perspective.

The gameplay is the usual very high quality, [b]except for the strider battle[/b] where you have to defend the silo, near the end of the game. I played through the game twice (100%ing the achievements), including that level, but my experience didn't change. That battle is annoying for several reasons:
[list]
[*]too long, 2 or 3 striders would have been enough, thank you. Avoiding player fatigue seemed a big deal in the game and its predecessors, but here you have to kill 10+ striders in a row, accompanied by lots of hunters??
[*]alot of weapon switching between the adhesive striderbusters and a handgun to hit those when they stick to a strider
[*]switching in and out of the car all the time
[*]going back and forth to pick up a striderbuster and put it in your car (ONE AT A TIME) and go back to a strider, rinse and repeat. That's not an enjoyable part of the battle, that's just tedious
[*]the accompanying hunters are annoying to kill because there are so many, with or without the car. Running them over with the car is hit and miss, it might have been better if the car had a 3rd person view. Killing them with weapons is tedious, they are bullet sponges. Killing them with the gravity gun and some heavy object is ok but you have to get close to them, and the distances in that level are big if you are on foot. More "in and out of the car"...
[/list]

So the strider battle has no flow, you constantly switch between combat and hurrying back to collect one single striderbuster, switch into and out of your car, look at the radar to find out you have to drive to the other end of the map for the n-th time.

The good thing about that battle was the precomputed physical destruction of those buildings. And the environment looks nice.

In the developer's commentary they say that this level was the longest in production and they had to put alot of work into it to make it work. They even had to tweak the autosave mechanism. That is a sure way to tell you're on the wrong path, putting too much awkward effort into making something work that just doesn't really work. I think they should have ditched the idea early on and thought of something else as a climactic battle.

In the developers' commentary they often say that they cut stuff or switched to another idea when something didn't work. This should have been such an occasion, too. But appparently they weren't so flexible here for some reason. I wonder what happened.

Sorry this review hits hard on that strider battle level that stands out for me as weaker than the rest.
Because the rest of the game is great nonetheless.

Nejdříve se procházíte po polorozbořeném vlakovém vedení, poté se podíváte do Antlioních dolů, atd. Více mě už nenapadá a tak teď budu psát jen PLUS a MINUS

1) Short. Less than 5 hours for as full of a playthrough as can be managed.
2) Don't pay full price for it, definitely wait for a sale. While it's stand alone, it shouldn't be considered a full game.
With both of those points said, it's a good continuation of the Half Life series. The story is solid, but cuts off abrubtly.

PS: Dear Valve, either come out with the next Half Life or expand the current games. It's time.

Będzie krótko, acz treściwie. Half Life 2 ogólnie po latach mnie zawiódł. Mam tu na myśli fakt ,że w 2007 roku grając robiłem "wooow" a teraz? W 2 denerwują mnie strasznie liniowe poziomy, oraz Alyx Vance upierdliwa jak but "Sorry Gordon musisz zrobić to sam/ czy byłbyś tak łaskaw i SAM wyłączył reaktor" itd. Również broń w stosunku do jedynki jest krokiem wstecz- oprócz Gravity Guna nie czuć feelingu broni :(
Perłą na szczęście jest epizod drugi- mimo, że rozgrywka jest krótka to bardzo intensywna i wciągająca, miejsca także są bardzo ciekawe (w podstawce wiało nudą gdy jeździłem tym łazikiem lub poduszkowcem), jaskinie antilonów klimatem  przypominają "Obcego", do tego opuszczone budynki kopalni gdzie roi się od zombie i poison headcrabów również kapitalnie buduje klimat (porównałbym to nawet do Ravenholm z dwójki). Akcja jest bardzo wartka i intensywan, choć szkoda, że dalej wszyscy wysługują się biednym Gordonem jak popychadłem "przynieś, zabij, pozamiataj". Epizod drugi na pewno warto mieć w swojej kolekcji gier i tak jak się miejscami męczyłem w HL2 i HL2: E1 to tutaj bawiłem się wyśmienicie! Polecam :)
It's just so good
Игра очень крутая всем играть надо! Жду HL 3 :)
10/10 would bang

Это просто шедевр!

Главная особенность второго эпизода — большие открытые пространства; лесная местность даёт игроку свободно путешествовать на новом автомобиле, а геймплей становится менее линейным: согласно задумке, с разнообразной тактикой ведения боя каждая битва будет непохожа на предыдущую. Кроме лесных территорий, игрок пройдёт заброшенные шахты, гнездо муравьиных львов и ракетную базу — все эти локации так же будут отличаться своей масштабностью.

Во втором эпизоде нет такого сосредоточения на кооперативной игре, как в первом: хотя сюжетно игрок проходит всю игру вместе со своей напарницей Аликс Вэнс, во многих игровых событиях она по тем или иным причинам не принимает участия. Кроме Аликс, игроку предстоит сражаться бок о бок с дружественными вортигонтами.

В Episode Two был немного изменён инвентарь игрока: фонарик теперь работает на независимой от HEV-костюма Фримена батарее. Разработчики расширили круг использования гравипушки: помимо применения её вместе с бомбами для страйдеров, было добавлено множество новых объектов, которые можно запускать во врага.
Ótimo jogo. Momentos de ação eletrizante.

Jouez s'y si vous ne l'avez pas déjà fais, il faut le faire au moins une fois dans sa vie, et, si la suite n'est toujours pas sorti à ce moment là, connaître la terrible frustration qui s'en suit. 

Valve bougez vous !

half life2 was a long time my favorite game! you cant see it on my playtime or on my achievements ! but i finished half life 2 , hl2 episode1, and half life 2 episode 2, all more than 3 times!! i think half life 2 is the most played shooter in my library! 10/10  if u buy the orange box in sale, i swear it is one of the best games on steam!

Now I know what most of you are thinking not another expansion Vale will kill this game series if they don’t make Half-Life 3 soon but I have to stop you all right there because this game is like playing a whole new Half-Life. I love the fact that they are still keeping their customers happiness at the top of their priorities list with yet another gripping story in a series of great games some minor improvement to the weapon selection but nothing over the top. Just like Half-Life 2 and Half-Life Episode One the gripping story line is enough to make you not want to stop until you finish the game with a few surprise instore for Gordon Freeman you will be weighting with mind numbing excitement for Half-Life 3 when it finally is released. I rate this game 8/10.
